name: Create new Microsoft 365 Calendar events from Notion database items
description:
Easily integrate your Notion database with Microsoft 365 Calendar to automatically generate events from items, ensuring organized schedules and improved productivity.

The template setup assumes you have a Notion database where all your meeting information is stored. Each item (page) on the database is a new meeting and it includes values for all the properties as showcased in this [example](https://www.notion.so/Create-new-Google-Calendar-events-from-Notion-database-items-87a6c3a697eb4a15ab42544f70abb038).
